nodes.description: 至少九人在Balochistan的Loralai DIG办公室遭到不明身份人士袭击，包括八名警察死亡，22人受伤。
nodes.support_text: At least nine people, including eight policemen were killed and 22 people injured after unidentified men attacked the DIG office in Balochistan’s Loralai on Tuesday.

nodes.description: 袭击者在办公室开枪并投掷了一枚手榴弹，发生在DIG面试求职者时。
nodes.support_text: The men opened fire on the office and threw a hand grenade inside, said the police.

nodes.description: 袭击发生时，Loralai DIG和SSP及其他执法人员在场，但未受伤。
nodes.support_text: The Loralai DIG and SSP and other law enforcer were present in the office during the attack, however, they remained unharmed.
More than 800 people were rescued from the office.

nodes.description: 袭击发生在下午12:30左右，当时有超过800名求职者在场。
nodes.support_text: Police said the attack happened at around 12:30 in the afternoon. Balochistan Home and Tribal Affairs Minister Mir Ziaullah Langau said more than 800 candidates were present inside the complex when the attack took place.

nodes.description: 警方正在监控该地区的入口和出口，并正在搜寻嫌疑人。
nodes.support_text: The police are monitoring the entry and exit points of the district, while the search for the suspects is under way.

edges.support_text: The men opened fire on the office and threw a hand grenade inside, said the police.
More than 800 people were rescued from the office.

Police said the attack happened at around 12:30 in the afternoon. Balochistan Home and Tribal Affairs Minister Mir Ziaullah Langau said more than 800 candidates were present inside the complex when the attack took place.
The police are monitoring the entry and exit points of the district, while the search for the suspects is under way.
The Loralai DIG and SSP and other law enforcer were present in the office during the attack, however, they remained unharmed.
